revised_title: Influence of Voltaic Currents on the Diffusion of Liquids: A Study of Electrolyte Boundary Phenomena
tldr: The author investigates the effects of voltaic currents on the diffusion of liquids, observing phenomena such as the formation of distinct lines at the boundary surfaces of electrolyte solutions and the apparent movement of liquid masses. The study provides insights into the behavior of electrolytes and their interactions under electric current.
